description: This Dart file defines an AccountProvider class which manages fetching and storing account data, notifying listeners about changes for UI updates in a Flutter application.

classes.name: AccountProvider
classes.description: A provider class extending ChangeNotifier, responsible for managing account data fetching and state management.

methods.name: fetchAccounts
methods.description: Asynchronously fetches account data from an external API and updates internal state accordingly, notifying listeners of changes.
